title: Smart Fitting Room
description: Pilot launch of interactive fitting experience
credits: As part of Random Studio (client NDA)
lede: As part of Digital Retail Experience team at Random Studio, I launched Smart Fitting Room pilot in two stores in Europe.

text.heading: Insight
text.text: Fitting rooms are the bottom funnel of a sale. However, most of them are generic and uninviting spaces, when they could be spaces optimized to make customers feel comfortable and confident in their choice.

text.heading: Idea
text.text: With integrated technologies such as RFID, controlled lighting and motion sensors, smart fitting room can provide a seamless shopping experience to aid clients in the search for their perfect fit, leading to increased conversion and sales for the retailer.

text.heading: End Result
text.text: Connected service allows customers to easily check and request alternative sizes and styles without having to leave the fitting room, saving their time and effort. Digital controls let them set the desired environment where they could feel most confident.

text.heading: Process
text.text: We kicked off the project by delving into HMW questions and pinpointing opportunity areas within the retail experience. Through research and ideation, we crafted a concept that was further validated with the development of a high-fidelity prototype. Leveraging feedback from stakeholders and targeted user interviews, we iteratively refined the design before implementing a pilot in a selected store.

Following the pilot launch, we refined the experience based on interviews with store associates and data analytics reports. This iterative process formed a crucial part of our continuous development efforts, ensuring ongoing enhancement and optimization of the product.
